txt.en: A powerful host of Orcs camps within the Circle of Wrath, in Zhar Skator.\n\nYou should seek out and defeat one of the Orc-captains.
Defeat one of Ugrukh么r's captains at Zhar Skator
'You defeated an Orc-captain? Ah, I can hear the tumult from here! Very well-done, my friend! I wager they will be more disorganized after that, just wait and see!'

'Our position here? Precarious, my friend!

'To the west of here lies Zhar Skator, an encampment of the Orcs, from which several captains keep the lesser Orcs in line. If something were to happen to one of these captains, those under their command might become unruly and disorganized....

'Do you understand me? I see that you do.'
You should return to Thornaran with news of your victory over the Orc-captain.
From Zhar Skator, one of Ugrukh么r's captains commands an Orc army in the Circle of Wrath.
